verses.roman:
rāse yaiche ghara yāite gopīre ājñā dilā
tāṅra ājñā bhāṅgi' tāṅra saṅge se rahilā

synonyms: rāse—at the time of the rāsa dance; yaiche—as; ghara yāite—to return home; gopīre—the gopīs; ājñā dilā—Lord Kṛṣṇa ordered; tāṅra—His; ājñā—order; bhāṅgi'-breaking; tāṅra saṅge—in His association; se—they; rahilā—kept themselves.
translation: During the rāsa dance, Kṛṣṇa asked all the gopīs to return home, but the gopīs neglected His order and stayed there for His association.
